replace tests_require with extra_require (#38)

* replace tests_require with extra_require

data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Set all parameters as read-only. (#40)

* Reject parameter updates.

While there are a number of parameters here that can be
set at startup, none of them can actually be configured
at runtime successfully.  Set them to read-only.

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@gmail.com>

data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Changelog.

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@openrobotics.org>

data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Add Windows support to teleop_twist_keyboard. (#24)

* Add Windows support to teleop_twist_keyboard.

Based on the original code from ayushghosh21 in
https://github.com/ros2/teleop_twist_keyboard/pull/23 , but
fixed up to work on both Linux and Windows.

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@openrobotics.org>

* Make getKey() always return a string.

That way we get more consistent behavior between Windows and
Linux, particularly with non-ASCII keyboards.

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@openrobotics.org>

* Remove unused 'select' import.

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@openrobotics.org>

Eloquent.  Fix it here.

data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Make sure to add teleop_twist_keyboard to ament index. (#6)

This ensures that this package is ros2 run-able, even in
a debian package.

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@osrfoundation.org>

data.author: Adam Allevato
data.message:
ROS 2 port (#1)

* Bumped package format to 2

* Re-organizing package.xml and updating description

* Fixed typos and updated readme

* Updated whitespace, license, and help text

* Line length and semicolon removal

* Updated to ROS 2 Python build

* Updated to Python 3 and ROS 2

* Added geometry_msgs dependency to package.xml

* Added QOS

* Added copyright line

* Adjusted setup.py version number

* Fixed whitespace

* Added ament_python dep and rosrun support

* Code style tweaks and add OSRF copyright

* Added test files and mostly complied with tests

* fix copyright and license

* alphabetical order

* wrapping

* remove temporary files
